actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the definition of the term "non-resident" used by the Internal Revenue Service.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Internal Revenue Service should define a "non-resident" as any person whose permanent principal, actual dwelling place in fact is not the United States.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the definition of the term "non-resident" used by the Internal Revenue Service.
